features: ✈️【Leak-Proof & Squeezable】The 5x 90ml travel size bottles are made of food-grade silicone, thick and durable but can be easily squeezed, make it feel soft and flexible. Travel toiletry containers feature a 3-layer leak-proof design design to prevent leaks or spills, keeping your luggage and clothes safe and clean.

✈️【TSA Approved & Convenient】The travel shampoo and conditioner bottles are lightweight, portable, and TSA approved, you can breeze through security with confidence. Attach labels to the bottles for easy identification. Perfect size for airport security checks and traveling.

✈️【Wide Application】Silicone travel bottles are perfect for holding shampoo, bath lotion, conditioner, sunscreen, facial cleanser, toner, cosmetic cream, prime and etc. Perfect for travel, vacation, plane trip, and camp.

✈️【Reusable Travel Essentials】HEYMKGO travel size bottles for toiletries set is the wonderful solution for your hassle-free travel. With a high-quality zip clear bag, 5x 90ml silicone squeeze bottles, 2x 60ml spray bottles, 2x 10ml jars, 1x funnel, 2x spoons, 10x disposable compressed facial towels, and 1x page label, you'll have everything you need to stay organized on the go.

✈️【Easy to Fill & Clean】Portable travel bottles feature a wide mouth design, making fill and pouring thicker liquids a breeze. And the bottles can be detached easily for better cleaning. The fashion colorful design is suitable for men and women, perfect travel companion for you.

The fashion colorful design is suitable for men and women, perfect travel companion for you. HEYMKGO 15PCS brushes kit includes everything you need for a natural look face and eye makeup application. Ideal for foundation,contouring, blending, shading and highlighting,eye makeup. With hand bag, it will not occupy much space in your suitcase From primer base to contouring, highlighting, shading, blending, concealering,eye makeup to face makeup, and more, our makeup brush set has everything you need to create flawless looks. Perfect for makeup lovers and beginners alike! Powder puffs are made of velvet and cushiony sponge. Velvet powder puff counteract the natural tendency of oily skin and give your skin a comfortable feel. A set of 4 meets your daily use and replacement needs. Triangle powder puff is suitable for both wet and dry makeup. Suitable for wet products such as foundations, barrier creams, BB creams, sunscreens, cushions and blushes; and dry products such as body powders, pressed / loose powders, eye shadows. With 1pc dual-ended angled eyebrow brush, 1pc under-eye concealer brush and sponge, 1 pc angled eyeliner cosmetic brush. 3pcs eye make up brushes meet all your daily or work eye makeup needs, and allow you carry less when go outside or travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These little bottles are exactly what I needed for my trip. I have had others that leaked but these did not! The colors are super fun too. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel bag
reviews.reviewText: This travel bag is a great size. The refillable containers are great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great with TSA
reviews.reviewText: Works good for traveling. TSA was a breeze. Nice to have within a zippered case if anything leaks, which it didn't.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars love the color design
reviews.reviewText: Set is great; I purchased this because of the very vibrant color pattern to simply look at the bottle and know what is inside rather than other brands and having to look at the tiny label in the shower. Didn't try the cream holders but the silicone and spray bottle kept everything in. Also has very limited label selection or non existent for men like hair gel, shave cream.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It sounds silly, but these little containers make me smile. The colors are so cool and fun, and the material is a soft rubber which is has a great feel to it. They compress as they empty, which saves space and the caps are sturdy. I was tired of having a bunch of different containers and not knowing how much product is in each or even what is in them, but these containers make me feel super organized; I know what is in them because there are labels, and they look great. The compacted towels was a fun little extra!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars nice travel set!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. i purchased these because of the fun colors, and am not disappointed! what i received is exactly as pictured! great little travel bottles, with nice tools to fill them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work great, don't leak, easy to squeeze!
reviews.reviewText: I love having soft silicone bottles for my shower essentials when I travel and, between my fiance and I, we have 4 or 5 different sets that we rotate through on our trips. I am really happy with these! Compared to other ones I've used, I like that the opening of these (when you take the cap off) is wider so they are easier to fill and easier to clean out after. I was a little worried with how easy it was to get the caps off, since that could also mean they just pop off when in your bag, but it didn't end up being an issue! The travel bag this set comes in is surprisingly nice! Usually the bag included in these sets is useless, super fragile, and not worth using. I always toss them and use my own bags but I genuinely used the bag it came with this time and it was great! I haven't tried the facial towels yet (I forgot them on my last trip) but I thought that was a nice touch that I haven't ever seen in any of my other kits! The colors are what drew me to this kit, and they don't disappoint in person. Really cute! I also appreciate that the label goes on the side of lid, instead of on the bottom of the lid. Since you stand the bottles up with the lid down, it was really great being able just see the labels easily, so I appreciated that design choice as well. These may feel like silly details, but when comparing these different sets, these are the things I am starting to notice! This sets stands out as a good one :)
Llevaba tiempo buscando algo así, gran calidad precio.Mejor de lo que esperaba ! Recomiendo sin duda
On l'utilise pour le sac à langer et c'est vraiment super pratique

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These were BRILLIANT for my holiday!I was pleased to find some which didn't leak & lids didn't pop off!They look really good too :)
Schönes vielfältiges Set, große Öffnung, somit gut zu befüllen, ob es nach 2 Reisen am Rand einreißt, wie mein Set zuvor, kann ich noch nicht beurteilen- Schön auch die Klarsichthülle dazu
